attributes.action: Enable ALL DWP complaints to be made online
attributes.additional_details:
UC and JSA online complaints are often not investigated and 
no acknowledgement with a ref is provided. The online system should be extended to include complaints against all types of pensions and benefits.

THE PROBLEM IS THAT CLAIMANTS CANNOT PROVE THAT THEY MADE A COMPLAINT. THERE IS NO PROPER TRACKING SYSTEM

HMRC's online complaint form via the personal tax account is an example of a system that works extremely well. The complainant receives a PDF containing full details of the complaint together with a tracking ref

The DWP should adopt and introduce the same type of complaint form/ features as HMRC
attributes.background:
The DWP complaints process is a complete failure.

Telephone complaints are in the majority of cases not investigated and no formal response is sent out

Complaints in writing are often ignored
